overview.en: Bitrou is the world's first decentralized comprehensive data service platform targeting DeFi, including DeFi data query, tracking, DeFi platform voting rating, DeFi currency prediction rating, scam anti-counterfeiting and other services, and will introduce decentralized transaction insurance services , To become a comprehensive data service platform necessary for major DeFi application platforms in the future.
overview.zh: Bitrou是全球首家以DeFi为对象的去中心化综合数据服务平台，包含DeFi数据查询、追踪、DeFi平台投票评级、DeFi币种预言评级、骗局打假等服务，同时将引入去中心化交易保险服务，成为未来各大DeFi应用平台所必需的综合数据服务平台。
